about_the_game:
**Once you purchase this DLC, log into Freestyle 2 and check your Gift Box. **
**Please consider carefully when you are purchasing the DLC, the items cannot be refunded **
**Refunds and Chargebacks are against our Freestyle 2's User Agreement. **
If you have failed to receive the item after purchase, please contact Freestyle 2 **

Freestyle2 - Razak Character Coupon

DLC Content:

  • Razak Character Coupon

DLC Descriptions:
The Savior of the West, Razak

Let the light of salvation shine on Freestyle 2 with Razak, the divine warrior.
This DLC introduces Razak, a beacon of hope and power, ready to lead your team to victory.
Embrace his holy might and dominate the court with unrivaled skill and grace.

If you were not able to receive the DLC, please logout and login again.
if you still didn't get your DLC, please send us an Email.

Please follow the instruction in the Getting Started Manual. (** Guide images may contain a different package image)
Find the Getting Started Manual at Quick Reference. which is placed on the right hand side of the page.

name: Freestyle2 -  Razak Character Coupon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Window XP
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Window 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE 9800 GT 1GB or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Unlock Razak, the Savior of the West Radiant abilities and divine moves Bring the light of salvation to every match Let Razak guide your path to glory in Freestyle 2!
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Thai, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
